title: Lint spec for factories
body_html:
This is a follow up for #871. It adds a lint spec to the test suite which "lints" all our FactoryBot factories based upon the build in lint task 👮 .

The idea / motivation have factories build the most minimal but valid object. Being able to rely on a factory always returning a valid objects makes writing tests overall more easy - especially when it comes to test setup, the in my opinion hardest part in legacy Rails apps 😉

Sidenote
As a drive-by-refactoring 🚜 I also changed a flaky spec and removed to obsolete helper files.

This is a follow up for #871. It adds a lint spec to the test suite which "lints" all our `FactoryBot` factories based upon the [build in lint task](https://github.com/thoughtbot/factory_bot/blob/master/GETTING_STARTED.md#linting-factories) 👮 .

The idea / motivation have factories build the most minimal **but valid** object. Being able to rely on a factory always returning a valid objects makes writing tests overall more easy - especially when it comes to test setup, the in my opinion hardest part in legacy Rails apps 😉 

**Sidenote**
As a *drive-by-refactoring*  🚜  I also changed a flaky spec and removed to obsolete helper files.
